summary:
Intel is an American tech company that designs and makes computer parts. It's one of the biggest chip makers globally and was founded in 1968 by Gordon Moore and Robert Noyce. Intel's processors are in most computers, and they also make other tech components.

In the 1990s, Intel's partnership with Microsoft helped shape the PC industry. However, they've faced competition over time, especially from AMD. Despite this, Intel remains a leading PC microprocessor supplier, with a big market share. They're known for their Intel Core CPUs and Intel Arc GPUs, used in high-performance PCs and gaming.
title: Intel
